definition: dark spot or blotch on the skin
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
(bird species of China) common grasshopper warbler (Locustella naevia)

sentences.english: Then a finger pulp is used to massage by drawing circles on the black spots.
sentences.chinese: 然后用指腹在黑斑部分打圈搓揉。

sentences.english: The characteristics of the oral melanotic macule and the junctional change were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 作者还就口腔黑斑，交界变等问题进行了讨论。

sentences.english: My poor master cannot either eat or speak.
sentences.chinese: 你可不能吃满是黑斑的鱼。

sentences.english: That can prevent problems called black spot and mildew.
sentences.chinese: 这样可以避免黑斑病和霉菌。

sentences.english: Identification of pathogen of apple black spot from America.
sentences.chinese: 进境美国苹果果实中黑斑病病原的初步鉴定。

sentences.english: The original infection pathogen was mainly in twigs.
sentences.chinese: 小枝中的病原菌为黑斑病主要初侵染来源。

sentences.english: A spotted hyena keeps its distance from an aggressive Cape cobra
sentences.chinese: 一只黑斑鬣犬与一条好斗的好望角眼镜蛇保持距离。

sentences.english: The black stain problem in enamelled wires production is systematically discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文就漆包线成品黑斑问题进行了全面讨论。

sentences.english: As they are very prone to blackspot, spraying is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 因为它们很容易受黑斑病侵害，所以必须喷药。

sentences.english: Birds have made the black prints on yellow.
The bruise became black and blue.
sentences.chinese: 这个梨子有碰伤的黑斑。

sentences.english: You can 't eat fish covered with dark specks .
sentences.chinese: 你可不能吃满是黑斑的鱼。

sentences.english: The degeneration and specialization phenomenon showed that they were consanguineously connected with their habitant environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些退化和特化现象与黑斑原的生境有着密切的关系。

definition: macula lutea (anatomy, central area of retina)/yellow spot
